items.title: Urban Flow
items.description: Motion & freedom in urban landscapes. A study of movement and city life captured in minimalist form.

items.title: Mirror
items.description: Self-reflection in minimalist form. Exploring identity through soft gradients and ethereal lighting.

items.title: Dreamscape
items.description: Surreal landscapes from the subconscious. Blending reality with imagination in pastel hues.

items.title: Neon Nights
items.description: Cyberpunk aesthetics meet traditional art. Vibrant colors dance through digital dimensions.

items.title: Serenity
items.description: Finding peace in chaos. A meditative piece exploring calmness amidst urban complexity.
